edge: Salman Khan plays the character Pawan Kumar Chaturvedi in the movie.

Najeem Khan acts as the teenage version of Pawan Kumar Chaturvedi.

Meher Vij portrays Razia Aziz, Rauf's wife and Shahida's mother who ends up losing her in the train.

Om Puri plays Maulana Azad, a religious scholar.
Adnan Sami sings in the song 'Bhardo Jholi Meri'.
